CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: In the solid state , the planarity effect and interchain stacking of PffBB-n caused the bathochromic shift of the absorption cut - off to ∼ 780 nm , corresponding to a narrow optical band gap of ∼ 1.61 eV.

Let's think step by step.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PffBB-n |

Explanation:

* PffBB-n is the only entity that can be classified as a material name in the given paragraph. The other entities such as "the solid state", "the planarity effect", "interchain stacking", "the bathochromic shift", "the absorption cut-off", "a narrow optical band gap", and "∼ 1.61 eV" do not refer to material names.

After reviewing the entities, I have removed "solid state" as it is a state of matter and not a material property. The remaining entities are all material properties mentioned in the paragraph.
